description: Lionel Messi dribbles past three defenders and scores with a beautiful chip over the goalkeeper!
Mohamed Salah receives the ball on the wing, cuts inside, and curls a perfect shot into the top corner!
Cristiano Ronaldo jumps incredibly high to meet a cross and powers a header into the net!
Haaland outmuscles two defenders and unleashes a thunderous shot that rattles the back of the net!
Kevin De Bruyne plays a perfectly weighted through ball that splits the defense, allowing Mahrez to score easily!
Mbapp√© uses his lightning pace to sprint past the defense and calmly slots the ball past the onrushing goalkeeper!
Benzema controls a difficult ball with his chest, turns, and volleys it into the top corner in one fluid motion!
Achraf Hakimi makes a brilliant overlapping run and delivers a perfect cross for Ziyech to head in at the far post!
The goalkeeper makes an incredible double save, first diving to his left to stop a penalty, then leaping to his feet to block the rebound!
In the last minute of the game, Al-Nassr wins the ball in midfield and launches a counter-attack that ends with Ronaldo scoring the winning goal!
